Claim: "Four young children are playing the same thing."
Referring expressions: Four young children, same thing.  Four young children, horseshoes.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsFour(a) and IsPlaying(a,b))) & (forall d ( IsFour(d) ->   IsPlaying(d))) & (forall e (  IsPlaying(e) ->  IsFour(e))) & (forall f (  IsPlaying(f) ->  IsFour(f))) & (forall g ( IsFour(g) ->   IsPlaying(g)))) -> (exists a (IsFour(a) and IsPlaying(a)))
